ygData.subject: Re: Newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... this ... SNIP ... is ... I look forward to the day where such an opportunity exists. Perhaps if I joined a guild. Hmmm... Know any good ones on Innoruuk?
ygData.messageBody:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> for the past couple months, I have been fighting with the same group - a
> regular group. we are well balanced class wise (tank tank healer caster
> bard) with a couple 'extra' chars we can go to the bench for (wizards,
> enchanter, necro, druid). you should really work to put something like
this
> together for your eq experience.
SNIP
> keep tryin and try to get a group going that plays on a regular basis and
is
> well balanced group of classes.

I look forward to the day where such an opportunity exists. Perhaps if I
joined a guild. Hmmm... Know any good ones on Innoruuk? ;)

Unfortunately I can only play a couple days a week anymore without my family
conducting an intervention in my best interests. I'll be lucky to stay at
half your level, Sylly. Don't know how you do it. While Shada's level
progression is impressive, yours is a close second. :)

Operaman
Meandering Maestro, still of the 17th song
Innoruuk
